attributes.action: make Ofcom do a public interest test when selling off Freeview HD spectrum so that content is available on a free to view basis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Freeview HD (digital terrestrial TV in High Definition) should be broadcasted in free to view format. Only this why will HD television content will viewable by everyone in the UK and not just those who can afford to pay for such a service.  Ofcom should take this in to consideration when auction of the spectrum.  As such Ofcom should proform a public interest test when auction of the spectrum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
